verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is every one that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands<s%>: <S%H835>happy<s%> shall you <S%H2896>be<s%>, and it shall be well with you.

Your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be as a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> by the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%>: your <S%H1121>sons<s%> like <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8363>plants<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> your <S%H7979>table<s%>.
<S%H1397>Behold<s%>, that thus shall the man be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>.
<S%H7200>Yes<s%>, you shall see your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7965>peace<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
